p:
The age control of NOW25c was attained by 10 accelerator mass spectrometry (AMS) radiocarbon dates at Aarhus AMS Centre (AARAMS), Aarhus University, 9 on terrestrial moss remains and 1 on humic extraction of a bulk sample (Supplementary TableÂ 1). The radiocarbon ages of the samples were converted into calendar years using the IntCal13 calibration curve
55 . The age model was calculated using the R routine BACON
54 . Ages reported and used in the figures are median modelled ages converted to calibrated years before 2000 (cal yrs b2k).
